> Shokaract over commlink to Zardus: Zardus, are we firing again?..

.
Necromancer lost his patience with the situation, "No you're dieing." he
fired five fireballs at Shockarackt, smiling as the weapon recoiled with
each shot.


----- Original Message -----
From: SOULSTICE <thecode@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, January 16, 2001 3:58 PM
Subject: Re: Necromancer's fight with Mobster


> Shokaract: Well, now your comrade Angel Prime has pushed the Alliance too
> far, I see. Your comrade is not going to survive, now.
>
> Shokaract over commlink to Zardus: Zardus, are we firing again?...
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>
> To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>

> Subject: Re: Necromancer's fight with Mobster
>
>
> > Necromancer kept his weapon aimed at Shockaract, "Or you'll do what?" he
> was
> > curious about what the answer would be but  soon realised that it wasn't
> > important. "Pick up your bots and get the seven levels of the pit out of
> > here." The bot wasn't happy about the abuse he'd taken earlier, and
didn't
> > want to give any of these bots the chance to do more damage.
> >
> >

better
> > stop
> > > firing before long...

> > > > that existed. What good would collecting wounded be if the other
side

> > > > just how hurt they were.

> > > > > > Necromancer sneers at Shockaract aiming the tip of his gun at
the
> > tip
> > > > > > of the tanks gattling gun, "Iron Raptor trusts to easily." They
> were
> > > > > > close enough now for either one to hit the other. "I've seen to
> much
> > > > > > treachery from your kind to believe that a cease fire will ever
be
> > > > > > honored. Now take your lackeys and leave or I WILL make sure
that
> > you
> > > > > > can't return to anywhere."
> > > > > >

> > > > > > >

gun.

head
> > > > > > > > on. "When will you learn about using elemental attacks on an

(One
> > at
